State.Name: Ambient Wasteland - Fallout 4 Edition

State.Author: BmanBlazer
State.Description: This mod adds a brand new Backpack system to the Commonwealth.
State.Name: Backpacks of the Commonwealth

State.Author: epsadin
State.Description: This is an extended version of the amazing Barefoot Footstep mod. It adds barefoot sounds to metal, carpet and vault floor materials, as well as modifies stone / concrete and sand ones. This mod also adds barefoot sneaking sounds to all of the above. Credit goes to the user GrozaTerroristow, who is the author of the famous original mod.
State.Name: Barefoot Footstep Extended

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: A high-quality Beretta M9/92FS pistol featuring loads of colors, high-tech modifications, and unique legendaries. All new meshes, textures, and sounds. Designed to be viable for a full play-through.
State.Name: Beretta M9-FS Pistol (92FS)

State.Author: zestoflemon
State.Description: A BF4 44 Magnum animation and sound set for the vanilla .44 Pistol
State.Name: BF4 44M

State.Author: BetaVirus
State.Description: This mod improves performance (FPS) in Boston and surrounding area. External areas only. This mod is beneficial to anyone that roams the boston area with mods that disable previs or break precombines in the boston area.
State.Name: Boston FPS Fix - aka BostonDT PreVis-PreCombine

State.Author: Valyn81 and BenRierimanu
State.Description: ESP Replacer for BostonFPSFix with PRP patches applied on top.
State.Name: Boston FPS Fix - PRP Edition

State.Author: ap05
State.Description:
Burst Impact Blast FX MOD changes the fallout4 particle effect.

Fallout 4 Effect is not cool. So I change it coolly like the latest FPS game.

All the resources I modified are those included in Fallout 4.
State.Name: Burst Impact Blast FX

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Campsite is a simple, lightweight camping mod that adds craftable / carryable tents, sleeping bags (new HD textures!), dog beds, fires, lanterns, and cooking pot, each with their own unique dynamics, sounds, interactivity.  Simple enough for light play, detailed enough to make you feel involved. VR-friendly.
State.Name: Campsite - Simple Wasteland Camping (and HD Sleeping Bags)

State.Author: Elianora
State.Description: Small, amazing looking player home with the settlement system. All workbenches, tons of custom storage and clutter, mirror to change your appearance, etc.
State.Name: Chestnut Lodge - Player Home

State.Author: D1v1ne122 - RokMod - DanielVictory
State.Description: Children of Ug-Qualtoth is a lore-friendly suspenseful lovecraftian quest mod with a sprawling dungeon, unique enemies, custom composed music and new weapons. Follow the trail of the Dunwich company and discover a disturbing past long forgotten.
State.Name: Children of Ug-Qualtoth

State.Author: SuperNath97
State.Description:
After receiving a lead to a condemned apartment complex on the outskirt of West Roxbury, you are compelled to visit it.



Claustrophobia is a fan homage to the cancelled silent hills game, it was inspired by its predecessor silent hill 2 and resident evil 1.
State.Name: Claustrophobia

State.Author: Aarwyn and ANiceOakTree
State.Description: Collection of conversions from Skyrim's KS Hairdos and ApachiiSkyHair.
State.Name: Commonwealth Cuts - KS Hairdos - ApachiiSkyHair

State.Author: bluechipmunk1225
State.Description: Complete overhaul of gunshot sounds that covers all ranged weapons of Fallout 4 (player+NPC)
State.Name: Commonwealth Gunfire Overhaul - realistic weapon sounds

State.Author: LiquidBronze
State.Description: Commonwealth Wilderness Overhaul is a medium-large sized mod that adds dozens upon dozens of hand placed scenes, objects and creatures across the entire commonwealth wilderness.
State.Name: Commonwealth Wilderness Overhaul

State.Author: Giggilyomeromicon
State.Description: Adds approximately 170 spawnpoints with passive wildlife.
State.Name: Commonwealth Critters

State.Author: Reelo2228
State.Description: Mannequins of the haunted past... adds some spookiness to your adventures.
State.Name: Creepy Mannequins

State.Author: Bwones and ColdFrontST
State.Description: Adds a Crossbow with custom animations and level list integration.
State.Name: Crossbow

State.Author: gargorias
State.Description: This is a comprehensive lighting mod that brings you many more shadow lights and a general improvement to overall lighting, ambience and fog to the interiors of the Commonweatlh, Far Harbor and Nuka World.
State.Name: Ultra Interior Lighting

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Squeaks, buzzes, rumbles... Adds over 40 hand placed sounds to Diamond City
State.Name: Diamond City Ambience

State.Author: AKcelsior and crazyjackal
State.Description: Sick of molerats and bloatflys triggering epic combat music? So are we.
State.Name: Dynamic Music Overhaul

State.Author: Screaminglake
State.Description: This guide will provide a complete horror-themed overhaul of Fallout 4 for both new and veteran modders.  It uses Whispering Hills and Fallout 4-76 Open World at its core to completely transform the game into a terrifying and unique survival-horror open exploration experience.
State.Name: Whispering Chills Resurrection - A Horror Overhaul Modding Guide

State.Author: Elianora
State.Description: Mod ads 50 new lore-friendly armours, 20 accessories, tons of moddable colours. Institute, Settler, Wastelander, Raider, Vault suit. Both sexes. Vanilla and CBBE body, with BodySlide compatibility.
State.Name: Eli's Armour Compendium

State.Author: Dank Rafft
State.Description: The definitive edition of Armor and Clothing Overhaul, Crafting Framework and Quick Gun Modification, combined in a single plugin. Extensive and fully modular but lightweight equipment overhaul and expansion of the crafting system. Configure the mod to your liking via holotape or MCM.
State.Name: Equipment and Crafting Overhaul (ECO)

State.Author: Valdacil
State.Description: This mod allows you to have Dogmeat and a standard companion at the same time using in game functionality (not hacks or console commands).
State.Name: Everyone's Best Friend (Dogmeat and Companion At Same Time - No Console - No Hack)

State.Author: Macabre Productions
State.Description: The File-of-the-Month winning mod from Fallout 3 reaches the Commonwealth!  A full stand-alone radio station featuring hours of original music & hours of DJ talk and banter with a fully written 'fleshed-out' robot DJ!
State.Name: Existence 2.0

State.Author: reg2k and Neanka
State.Description: The Extended Dialogue Interface removes the hardcoded 4-option limit on dialogue and adds full engine support for any number of player dialogue options.
State.Name: Extended Dialogue Interface

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Don't let her get you
State.Name: Fainthearth Manor - A horror mod

State.Author: Brooklyn Taylor
State.Description: This is long awaited merge of FallEvil from Arroganz. This combines all FallEvil ediitons into one simple package.
State.Name: FallEvil - Complete Edition

Original.Name: FallEvil - Mega Zombie Pack Main File-59293-1-0-1648866574.rar

State.Author: Arroganz
State.Description: Final released one of my biggest projects to date. Includes zombies from RE 2 Remake, Umbrella Chronicles, Racoon City, and the original RE 1 Remake. This is no April Fools joke...
State.Name: FallEvil - Mega Zombie Pack

Original.Name: (2K Perf. - BSA) Fallout 4 Ultimate Window Overhaul-43458-3-2-1650552300.rar

State.Author: SickStyle
State.Description: You won't know you really need this mod, until you install it. This mod overhauls all windows across the Commonwealth. RTX-ish next-gen reflections!
State.Name: Fallout 4 Ultimate Window Overhaul

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: THE NIGHTS ARE DARK AND FULL OF FERALS. If the player is not safe at a defended workshop during the night, large packs of feral ghoul hunters will chase the player from dusk 'till dawn.
State.Name: Feral Nights by SKK

State.Author: Ethganz - Ethnet and Arroganz-
State.Description: Starting the new year off strong. Adds more than seven new creatures to the Feral Ghoul faction that makes them much more challenging but funner to fight.
State.Name: FGEP - Feral Ghouls Expansion Pack

Original.Name: FGEp Tank Tweak Fix - Uploaded by 4estGimp-57181-FIX-1648233007.7z

State.Description: Starting the new year off strong. Adds more than seven new creatures to the Feral Ghoul faction that makes them much more challenging but funner to fight.
State.Name: FGEP - Feral Ghouls Expansion Pack

State.Description: A standalone Fire Axe melee weapon, that can also start fires.
State.Name: Fire Axe - A Standalone Melee Weapon

State.Author: Glass
State.Description: Fixes most of the exterior flickering aka z fighting in the game, particularly in the Boston and Cambridge areas. (Modders Resource)
State.Name: Flicker Fixer

State.Author: reg2k
State.Description: Adds a photo mode to Fallout 4, accessible from the Pause menu or via hotkey.
State.Name: FO4 Photo Mode

State.Description: This guide will provide a complete horror-themed overhaul of Fallout 4 for both new and veteran modders.  It uses Whispering Hills and Fallout 4-76 Open World at its core to completely transform the game into a terrifying and unique survival-horror open exploration experience.

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: Simply makes glowing animal variants emit light, scaled to their size.
State.Name: Glowing Animals Emit Light

State.Author: L00
State.Description: GRIM is a  modular and comprehensive horror-based overhaul for Fallout4.
State.Name: GRIM - The Curse

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: A simple mod that aims to retexture the subway stations and make them look gritty and dirty.
State.Name: Gritty Subway Stations (2K - 4K)

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: HUDFramework is a UI framework that makes it possible for mods to add new UI elements to the HUD.
State.Name: HUDFramework

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Adds a new mechanic to gather meat, bones, skin and other materials from animals in a new immersive way.
State.Name: Hunter of the Commonwealth

State.Author: MunkySpunk - Pra - Whisper
State.Description: Replaces all awful vanilla candles with more advanced synchronized animated versions. No broken precombines, no overwritten precombines. All items are scrappable if encountered in workshop.
State.Name: Immersive Candles

State.Author: Zana Daniel
State.Description:
A Fallout experience that feels realistic, rewarding, and ultimately much more fun. 

Step out of the vanilla fantasy and step into some reality.
State.Name: Immersive Fallout

State.Author: Gopher
State.Description: HUD when you need. Hide when you don't.
State.Name: Immersive HUD - iHUD

Original.Name: Inner City Ambiance ESL flagged ESP-38666-1-2-1649011173.zip

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Wind, rumble and a bit of paranoia
State.Name: Inner City Ambience - An Urban Soundscape

State.Description: Adds more unmarked interior locations to the game.

State.Description: Adds more unmarked interior locations to the game.

State.Description: Adds the Ithaca Model 37 Pump Shotgun to the game with custom Models, Textures, Sounds and Animations! Requires Far Harbor DLC.
State.Name: Ithaca Model 37 - Pump Shotgun

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Endure a brief spooky quest to obtain the Kelly Macabre, a rifle made by a demented little girl named Madison. Happy Halloween!
State.Name: Kelly Macabre

State.Author: ossumpossum
State.Description: Decent workaround to this horrendous issue
State.Name: Flickering Blood and Flickering Puddles - The Solution

State.Author: AGodComplexPikachu CurioNC EmissaryOFWind JTesmer ANiceOakTree Kirse10 imAarwyn Robberfox RoboAsimov TrophiHunter Wendera
State.Description: A mod that adds hundreds of new options to customize your character such as face paint, tattoos, scars, makeup, brows, haircolors, etc~!
State.Name: Looks Menu Customization Compendium

State.Author: Mortercotic
State.Description:
Sound mods pack and other tweaks!

Don't expect big changes since I want this to be as much compatible as possible and to let users choose their own sound mods. If you want to help and/or advice of better ways, please let me know.

State.Author: EvTital - i_code_i
State.Description: Adds a new heavy weapon, the M2 flamethrower with custom animations and leveled list integration.
State.Name: M2 Flamethrower Redux

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Save, load, transfer, import and export all your MCM settings at once. Transfer settings between savegames, backup your favorite settings, or send your settings to another user!
State.Name: MCM Settings Manager

State.Author: BiRaitBec
State.Description: Complete Modlist and Load Order Guide for Best Fallout 4 Modding Experience. Extreme Fallout 4 Engine & Textures Mods Optimization.
State.Name: Fallout 4 Mod List and Load Order Guide (BiRaitBec Modlist)

State.Author: MassShep
State.Description: Misty Pines Overhaul
State.Name: Misty Pines Overhaul

State.Author: Soroka90
State.Description: More lighting for the playing field!
State.Name: More Oil Lamps ENG

State.Author: ajuszkiewicz
State.Description:
This mod adds six new throwing flares, twelve new fireworks flares, nine new rocket flares (including three weather changing), seven new flare mines and new flare gun with exchangeable chambers for multiple kinds of flare munitions. 

It is very handy when Darker Nights mod is active.
State.Name: Multi color flares

State.Author: TrickyVein
State.Description: Adds lots of Chainsaws to the game.
State.Name: Murdering Chainsaw

State.Author: gumgum339339
State.Description:
Adds a bunch of mutilated corpses to all Raider and Supermutant locations.

Plus a new quest and a weapon.
State.Name: Mutilated Dead Bodies

State.Author: Raff1969
State.Description: This is a starter kit for just as you exit the vault as we are told in the intro our hero was a soldier. When he left the Army he buried his old kit in his back garden,with a grand of his own money little did he know it would be worthless.
State.Name: Nate's Old Footlocker

State.Author: EvTital - TomaHawk - Neto - HeroicPie - i_Code_i - Cyrisus
State.Description: Adds a new outfit with custom camouflages and gloves.
State.Name: Private Military Company - PMC

State.Author: twizz0r
State.Description: A simple texture replacement to remove the persistent fake puddles from the game. No more fake reflections!
State.Name: No More Fake Puddles

State.Author: Dexials
State.Description: Remake and better version of my original no rad mod, this time "It just works"
State.Name: No Radiation (Redone)

State.Author: hidcon
State.Description: Disables VATS and overhauls perks that give bonus in VATS.
State.Name: No VATS Overhaul

State.Author: Poet
State.Description: Collection of patched plugins for several popular mods to prevent stuttering, crashing and other problems, all packed into a single modular FOMOD installer.
State.Name: Optimization Patches Collection

State.Author: FX0x01 - Hitman47101
State.Description:
This Mod adds the OTS-33

As usual the weapon features Custom animations, and sounds, and a variety of optional modifications.
State.Name: OTs-33 Pernach - Pistol

State.Author: BetaVirus
State.Description: This mod improves performance (FPS) in Boston and surrounding area. External areas only. This mod is beneficial to anyone that roams the boston area with mods that disable previs or break precombines in the boston area.
State.Name: Boston FPS Fix - aka BostonDT PreVis-PreCombine

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Features a brand new eat and drink system, which relies on weight of the item instead of the caps value and allows you to control it.

In addition to that, you can tweak many aspects of the survival added features. Like tweaking disease chance, disabling Adrenaline. Choose how long you can maximally sleep on the different bet types.

And mo
State.Name: Survival Configuration Menu

State.Author: AKcelsior
State.Description: Turn your radial Pip-Boy light into a directional flashlight!
State.Name: Pip-Boy Flashlight (Pipboy - Power Armor - Lamp Overhaul)

State.Author: EvTital - TomaHawk - Neto - HeroicPie - i_Code_i - Cyrisus
State.Description: Adds a new outfit with custom camouflages and gloves.
State.Name: Private Military Company - PMC

State.Author: HULKHOD3N x PR BF2 DevTeam
State.Description: Changes almost all footstep sounds into more realistic ones. Including subtle gear and backpack rattle. *Snow Edition* available.
State.Name: Project Reality Footsteps FO4

State.Author: Dylbill
State.Description: Some changes I made to registrator2000's Quicktrade mod, which adds an option to quickly trade with merchants and settlers.
State.Name: QuickTrade Redux

State.Author: MisterOverseer aka Oakland Elliff
State.Description: With the Rad Spiders mod, you can now come across everyone's favourite radioactive arachnids, the Rad Spider. Several newly added dungeons feature these brand new creepy crawlies.
State.Name: Rad Spiders - Giant Spiders of the Commonwealth

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: MORE RANDOM ENCOUNTERS ! Less Random Encounters ! no random encounters ! Take control of the base game random encounter system to amp up or dial down the combat opportunities.
State.Name: Random Encounter Manager by SKK

State.Author: IceKK
State.Description: Disabled Mouse Acceleration, Horizontal/Vertical Parity, Scalable ADS Multiplier, Normalized Sensitivity
State.Name: RAW INPUT - The Ultimate Mouse Sensitivity Fix

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: Dynamically find and replace virtually any actor(s) with virtually any actor(s) in game to deliver new exciting surprises. Then manage their respawning for yet more surprises over time.
State.Name: Replace Any Actor with Any Actor by SKK

Original.Name: Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul - ALL DLC-10189-1-6e.zip

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: Makes weapon sounds more realistic for player and NPCs. Improves and balances ambiance and reverb to be more realistic and lively.  Increases the diversity and dynamics of in-game sound.  Fixes numerous issues. Lightweight and compatible with all sound replacer mods.
State.Name: Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul

State.Author: StupidDunmer
State.Description: Removes all spoken dialogue and lines from the player character, making the dialogue experience closer to older Bethesda games.
State.Name: Silent Protagonist

Original.Name: Silent Protagonist Patch Compilation - FOMOD Installer-36418-2022-02-06-1644167239.rar

State.Author: Luniartic
State.Description: Voice pack patches, meant to be used with the mod Silent Protagonist and some other mods.
State.Name: Silent Protagonist Patch Compilation

State.Author: zorak912
State.Description: This mod adds new creepy and not-so-creepy sounds to the commonwealth atmosphere
State.Name: Sinister Ambient Sound

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: FastStart a new game in less than 2 minutes from Main menu > Looks menu > SPECIAL menu > Outside Vault 111 with most mod added inventory items. This is a scripted bypass, not a static savegame so you get full player customisation and fresh RNG.
State.Name: SKK Fast Start new game

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: Fallout 4-76 transforms the Commonwealth into an open world with all areas unlocked and no human NPCs for a quest free land of scavenging opportunity. Repopulate with whatever actors you need to create your own narrative for another survive, scavenge and rebuild experience.
State.Name: Fallout 4-76 Open World

State.Author: ProgmanX
State.Description:
Merges GOTTA115's DLC patch and Some Assembly required main esp into one.

Also add support for AWKCR, making it a requirement to install.

Standalone. Original mod not needed.
State.Name: Some Assembly Required (Merged DLC - AWKCR - PATCHES)

Original.Name: Stevens M-520 Shotgun Plus Update AIO-35943-1-9-1-1587228365.7z

State.Author: jsnider193 - BlutKult - Ragnarr1313
State.Description: Conversion of the Stevens M-520 shotgun resource posted here on the Nexus by Blutkult.  Includes 4 versions of the weapon (standard, camo, desert and the reaper looks) with multiple mods available to enhance the weapon. (Latest upload is fix for missing material file).  ESL work done by Ragnarr1313
State.Name: Stevens M-520 Shotgun

State.Author: Chiaro22
State.Description: This mod adds 11 new, atmospheric interiors to the Commonwealth; from failed businesses to rundown bars, long abandoned homes, and even a dark crypt or two.
State.Name: Stumble Upon Interiors

Original.Name: Subway runner dynamic lighting (shadows) V6.1 fixed nav mesh-18639-V7.rar

State.Author: Ghostfc3s
State.Description: This mod connects 90% of the standard subway stations, and creates a network of subway tunnels filled with raiders, super mutants, synths and ghouls. Subway stations have been added throughout this network.
State.Name: Subway Runner

Original.Name: Subways of the Commonwealth (SotC) - Standalone v.0.99g-21527-0-99g.rar

State.Author: Recluse
State.Description: Adds 7 functional, populated, and connected Subway Stations to the Commonwealth, located near Concord, Cambridge, Diamond City, Goodneighbor, The Castle, Malden Center, and Jamaica Plain. Immersive fast travel, rentable beds, cloud storage, shipping containers, crafting stations, guards, NPCs, Doctors, and Vendors. Ideal for survival mode.
State.Name: Subways of the Commonwealth (SotC) - Standalone

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Features a brand new eat and drink system, which relies on weight of the item instead of the caps value and allows you to control it.

In addition to that, you can tweak many aspects of the survival added features. Like tweaking disease chance, disabling Adrenaline. Choose how long you can maximally sleep on the different bet types.

And mo

State.Author: AKcelsior
State.Description:
Adds wearable flashlight gear to the wasteland.



+ 8 Unique models

+ 10 Distance settings

+ Craftable bulbs

+ Dynamic shadows

+ Volumetric light

+ Automatic leveled list integration
State.Name: Tactical Flashlights

State.Author: RedRocketTV
State.Description: The Boxcar Cottage is a small, no-frills way station player that serves as a resting place while on your way to somewhere else. It is located north of Tenpines Bluff and west of Outpost Zimonja. The Boxcar provides a place of refuge from radstorms allowing you to catch up on your sleep, drop off some loot, or do some crafting.
State.Name: The Boxcar Cottage Player Home

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Take a stroll at a distant cemetery, enjoy the silence and the hellhounds. You can also set up camp there.
State.Name: The Cemetery - Plainfield Cemetery

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Lift the curse of Blair Residence. And don't get killed by the ghost.
State.Name: The Curse of Blair Residence - A Tiny Horror House

Original.Name: The Eyes of Beauty Fallout Kaleidoscope Edition - All-in-One-133-3-2.7z

State.Author: LogRaam aka Gabriel Mailhot
State.Description: Change eyes textures for new high resolution ones.  Will work for both gender.  New textures will be added so keep in touch!
State.Name: The Eyes Of Beauty Fallout Edition

Original.Name: The Goodneighbor Condo Player Home v1.5-21873-1-5-1562241461.zip

State.Author: RedRocketTV
State.Description: A large, multi-level player home inspired by old-school player home mods from Fallout 3 and Fallout: New Vegas. It provides a comfortable, pre-decorated, move-in ready home with all the amenities and many scripted interactive features.
State.Name: The Goodneighbor Condo Player Home

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: A spooky horror quest mod. Go inside the Kelly Manor, enter a world of terror and hope you can escape alive.
State.Name: The Kelly Manor Horror - Quest

State.Author: Zherros
State.Description: Adds a new dungeon inhabited by a mannequin-obsessed cult.
State.Name: The Mannequin Cult

State.Author: RedRocketTV
State.Description: The Outcasts’ Hideout is an old-school bunker player home loaded with interactive features and custom assets. Many of the custom assets are recreations of those from FO3 and FNV. The bunker is based on Reimann’s Bunker from the Fallout: New Vegas mod, A World of Pain. The Hideout is located just east of Sunshine Tidings Co-Op.
State.Name: The Outcasts' Hideout Player Home

Original.Name: The Red Wave V2 (Far Harbor Update) v2.1.2-41874-2-1-2-1611418830.rar

State.Author: ScottyDoesKnow
State.Description: Player-owned fast travel boat with 12 Commonwealth and 4 Far Harbor locations. Requires Far Harbor.
State.Name: The Red Wave V2 (Far Harbor Update) - Personal Traveling Boat

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Step down into the sewers and see where the journey takes you
State.Name: The Sewers

State.Author: Corvalho
State.Description: This mod adds a standalone modular sawn off double-barrelled adjective-rich shotgun into your game.
State.Name: The Widow Shotgun

State.Author: L00
State.Description: A gore and blood overhaul for Fallout 4.
State.Name: True Blood

State.Author: mandragorasprouts
State.Description:
I find fallout 4 overly vibrant and colorful for post apocalyptic world,  climate must be harsh and unforgiving , so I tweaked weathers a bit.

Nothing too fancy, it's just subtle visual overhaul to give fo4 same desolate look  that older fallout games had.
State.Name: Polluted Climate

State.Author: gargorias
State.Description: This is a comprehensive lighting mod that brings you many more shadow lights and a general improvement to overall lighting, ambience and fog to the interiors of the Commonweatlh, Far Harbor and Nuka World.
State.Name: Ultra Interior Lighting

State.Author: Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch

State.Author: Nvidia
State.Description: New questline, 4 new areas to explore, displays new way of handling volumetric lighting.
State.Name: Vault 1080

Original.Name: West Tek Tactical Optics v2.0.1 (minor update)-12220-2-0-1.rar

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Night Vision / Thermal / Targeting HUD goggles and eyepieces with new meshes and HD textures. Fully modular, craftable, upgradeable. 3 vision effects, 8 colors, and 2 additional targeting enhancements. Schematics posters also in the Workshop!
State.Name: West Tek Tactical Optics - Night Vision Thermal Vision Goggles and More

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This small mod fixes the exaggerated shine of specific objects while it's raining.
State.Name: Wetness Shader Fix

State.Author: Mangaclub
State.Description: This mod turns Fallout 4 into a Silent Hill like Nigthtmare. From now on you will be surrounded by Thick Fog, strange sounds and occasionally being dragged into a otherworld where monsters (SirenHead, Mumblers, Lyingfigures, Ghouls, Silent hill Nurses, Twin head Screamers and Dogs) await you and Pyramidhead awaits you in his own Hell Level.
State.Name: Whispering Hills - a Silent Hill Horror overhaul for Fallout 4

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: A small to medium sized settlement contained in its own worldspace
State.Name: Witch House

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description:
Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.



For Players: New controls and faster, more stable workshop scripts.



For Modders: Add new resource types, override settings, and generally change the way settlements work dynamically.
State.Name: Workshop Framework

State.Author: Hedieded
State.Description:
Alternative to locational damage mods without any script and compatible with any weapon mod.

Now a crippled head or chest have lethal consequences.

Get rid of humanoid health pools with the least edits possible with a nice realistic vibe.
State.Name: _Balance_

State.Author: Hedied
State.Description: Adds actual gun shot reverbs which makes a big difference when shooting in interior.
State.Name: _Sound Zero_

State.Author: DoubleYou
State.Description: Bethesda's INI configuration files are a mess. BethINI optimizes the game for increased graphical fidelity and performance.
State.Name: BethINI

State.Author: Dank Rafft
State.Description: The definitive edition of Armor and Clothing Overhaul, Crafting Framework and Quick Gun Modification, combined in a single plugin. Extensive and fully modular but lightweight equipment overhaul and expansion of the crafting system. Configure the mod to your liking via holotape or MCM.
State.Name: Equipment and Crafting Overhaul (ECO)

State.Author: ElminsterAU and the xEdit Team
State.Description: FO4Edit is the Fallout 4 version of xEdit. xEdit is an advanced graphical module viewer/editor and conflict detector.
State.Name: FO4Edit

State.Author: Peregrin0
State.Description: Compatibility patch for Everyone's Best Friend (EBF) and version 2.1.0 of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (UFO4P). Both modify the same Papyrus script files causing one to override the corrections of the other. This mod merges the script changes.
State.Name: EBF UFO4P compatibility fix

State.Author: reg2k - Neanka - shadowslasher410
State.Description: The Mod Configuration Menu is a settings page for mods! It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: Provides version independent IDs used for dynamically relocating offsets at runtime.
State.Name: Address Library for F4SE Plugins

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: It's like buffout but for the engine
State.Name: Buffout 4

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which keeps game going in real-time while menus are open. This plugin is highly customizable,  you can toggle on/off every menu's unpause behavior via MCM.
State.Name: Fallsouls - Unpaused Game Menus

State.Author: ramccoid
State.Description: This retextures the sun to give a radiant effect.
State.Name: FO4 SUN

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

Now there is a separate version for VR.
State.Name: High FPS Physics Fix

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: If you're using a mod that makes the nights dark, you've probably seen them: White ripples on black water during dark rainy nights. This mod fixes this by making those ripples dark as well.
State.Name: Less Annoying Water Rain Ripples

State.Author: Ceaseless and PDE
State.Description:
This is the All In One pack requested by you all which includes 'Red Rockets Glare REDONE', 'Starlight Drive-In And Diner', 'Bus Stop

Lighting', and 'Illuminated Billboards' (Vanilla and All DLC Version). It is compatible with all other 'Lighting Series' mods that contain their own page, such as 'Radioactive Signs - Lighting'.
State.Name: Lighting Series  - All In One

State.Author: Ceaseless and PDE
State.Description:
Yeah, they were using it for lots of things those days...

Lights up the signs of stores and other places around the Commonwealth
State.Name: Radioactive Signs - Lighting - Cyberpunk 2077

State.Author: AntoniX
State.Description:
Fixed twitching/stuttering when sprinting in first person.



Исправление дрожания камеры от первого лица при спринте.
State.Name: Sprint Stuttering Fix

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which restores some hard-coded features disabled by game in survival mode,for example,unlock console,enable TGM,enable fast travel,restore vanilla compass settings,enalbe quick save and auto save,etc .
State.Name: Unlimited Survival Mode - F4SE

State.Author: Screaminglake
State.Description: This guide will provide a complete horror-themed overhaul of Fallout 4 for both new and veteran modders.  It uses Whispering Hills and Fallout 4-76 Open World at its core to completely transform the game into a terrifying and unique survival-horror open exploration experience.
State.Name: Whispering Chills Resurrection - A Horror Overhaul Modding Guide

State.Author: Cthorthu
State.Description: Vault interior retexture
State.Name: Dark Sci Fi Vault Retexture

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: A much better high contrast world map with roads, topography, and waterline all clearly visible.  Optional number grid and regions.
State.Name: Improved Map with Visible Roads

State.Author: Mr Dave
State.Description: Enhanced normal maps for the eyes.
State.Name: Eye Normal Map Fix Fallout 4 Edition

State.Author: Satafinix
State.Description: Full HQ Rework of Feral Ghouls Sounds for a more Vicious Encounters
State.Name: F.E.R.A.L -Feral Ghouls Sounds Rework-

State.Author: Azebal
State.Description: Replaces the commonwealth's dull/repetitive atmospheric sounds with that of Hunts.
State.Name: Hunt Showdown Atmospheric Ambience

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: A much better high contrast world map with roads, topography, and waterline all clearly visible.  Optional number grid and regions.
State.Name: Improved Map with Visible Roads

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: A much better high contrast world map with roads, topography, and waterline all clearly visible.  Optional number grid and regions.
State.Name: Improved Map with Visible Roads

State.Author: Satafinix
State.Description: HQ Total rework for Deathclaw sounds including new vicious sounds SFX
State.Name: Monsterum -DeathClaw Sounds Rework-

Original.Name: Alex's Male First Person Camera Height Fix-27582-2-0.zip

State.Author: Alex me lol
State.Description: Adjust the eyeheight in first person if you play as a male character.
State.Name: Alex's Male First Person Camera Height Fix

State.Author: bluechipmunk1225
State.Description: Complete redesign of Fallout 4's explosion sounds
State.Name: Commonwealth Explosion Overhaul

State.Author: bluechipmunk1225
State.Description: Complete redesign of Fallout 4's explosion sounds
State.Name: Commonwealth Explosion Overhaul

State.Author: epsadin
State.Description: This is an extended version of the amazing Barefoot Footstep mod. It adds barefoot sounds to metal, carpet and vault floor materials, as well as modifies stone / concrete and sand ones. This mod also adds barefoot sneaking sounds to all of the above. Credit goes to the user GrozaTerroristow, who is the author of the famous original mod.
State.Name: Barefoot Footstep Extended

State.Author: Monkatraz
State.Description: Fixes animation clipping on a lot of modded weapons, specifically the ones that go sideways.
State.Name: Grab the Damn Mag
